All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Ball
This is the abstract Ball class to store variable to generate ball
Brick
This is an abstract Brick class to store the variables to generate different types of brick in game
BrickFactory
This is BrickFactory class.
CementBrick
This is the CementBrick class to store variable to generate the cement brick
ClayBrick
This is the ClayBrick class to store variable to generate Clay brick
Crack
This is the Crack class to store the variable to make the crack effect on the brick.
DebugConsole
This is the DebugConsole class to create the pop put of the debug panel
DebugPanel
This is the DebugPanel Class create the button and slider to show on the debug dialog panel
DiamondBrick
This is the DiamondBrick Class which will store the variable to create the diamond brick.
GameController
This is the GameController class that update the GameModel and GameView class.
GameFrame
This is the GameFrame class to add the homemenu, instruction and gameboard to show on the window
GameModel
This is the GameModel class that store the variable used for GameController and GameView class.
GameView
This is the GameView class to show the game on the frame.
HomeMenuController
This is the HomeMenuController class to call the data in HomeMenuModel class and call the method from HomeMenuView class to show the HomeMenu pages in frame.
HomeMenuModel
This is the HomeMenuModel class to store the data for creating HomeMenu pages on window.
HomeMenuView
This is the HomeMenuView class to create and show the HomeMenu pages in the frame.
Instruction
This is the Instruction class to create the instruction pages and show on the frame.
Levels
This is the Levels class to generate the levels.
MainLauncher
This is the main class of the project (Brick Destroyer)
Player
This is the Player class to set and create the player's board
RubberBall
This is RubberBall class to create the ball on the GameBaord.
scoreController
This is scoreController class that used to call the data from model, read and write the file.
scoreModel
This is scoreModel class that store the score from the game including bonus and penalty score.
SteelBrick
This is the SteelBrick class to store variable generate the steel brick
WordFontStyle
This is the WordFontStyle class that store most of the font style used to draw the string and lines in the game.
